data.name: NAME_LENGTH
data.value: Name must be between 2 and 100 characters.

data.name: LEAVE_EARLIER_THAN_ARRIVE
data.value: Leave time must be after arrive time.

data.name: GRACE_LATE_ARRIVAL_NEGATIVE
data.value: Grace period for late arrival cannot be negative.

data.name: GRACE_EARLY_LEAVE_NEGATIVE
data.value: Grace period for early leave cannot be negative.

data.name: GRACE_TOTAL_EXCEEDS_PRESENCE
data.value: The sum of grace periods cannot exceed the presence duration.

data.name: PRESENCE_DURATION_INVALID
data.value: Presence duration must be a positive value.
